title: Bad Moon Academy: The Complete Series
description: Some wolves are born, others are made.That’s me. I was bitten, forced into this life against my will. Worse still, my wolf is an alpha female, meant to rule. But existing pack prejudices mean that every battle is fought uphill. Then there’s the fact that alpha females take on five mates. FIVE!I’ve never even had a serious boyfriend, and now everyone expects me to manage five? I have to find myself and my fated mates, all while navigating a dark academy with haunted halls and vicious spirits. Add in being separated from the only family I have left to all of that and life basically can’t get any worse.…Except when my inner wolf disappears and I have to face the evil spirits to get her back.
author: Rory Miles
